com.saltedge.connector.sdk.config

Class ApplicationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saltedge.connector.sdk.config.ApplicationProperties

  • @Configuration
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=ApplicationProperties.class)
 @ConfigurationProperties(value="connector")
public class ApplicationProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration properties from application.yml Example of application.yml connector: private_key_name: connector_private_prod.pem public_key_name: connector_public_prod.pem connection_expires_in_minutes: 5
